sentence: The rooms are gorgeous with private hot tubs and pools
From the incredible amenities at the pool to the additional attention at the spa to the beautiful garden dinner all rank among our favorites from the trip because of the staff
Now you walk outside on the upper deck and there is a plunge pool with 2 lounge chairs
The patio off this area had the plunge pool with a view of the ocean
The two restaurants were wonderful as were the pools
The pools were beautiful well staffed and all were family friendly except the spa pool which is adults only
The facilities were great and the pool staff seemed to have a photographic memory for our preferences
Again I did not need her because the pool had plenty of service folks ready to take your order bring towels fresh water bottles etc
The pool staff was great
Suites are very luxuriously appointed with plunge pools roof top decks and are extremely spacious
in summary everything was PERFECT and we hope you do not change a thing except for building the new pool
Kids allowed in adult only pool
I heard someone complain about the location of their room not being near the beach and their having to take a longer bike ride to beach pool area
Our plunge pool overlooked the lagoon which was nice to have a calming view but we could walk within three minutes to the polside restaurant and beach

The entry level rooms are basically a mini cotage I stayed in a lagoon view suite and had my own private pool and dock not to mention a rooftop area to sunbathe outdoor shower indoor shower and one of the largest tubs I have ever seen
For example the pool staff could do a little better at cleaning up lounge chairs when guests leave so other guests could have a few more seating options
Unfortunately the sea was too rough to swim but the long beach allows for a pleasant stroll
We though the pool food was great
I am a swimming pool guy so let ’s start there
It ’s a struggle to get out of some of the pools with nothing to pull up on
A swim up bar at the new adult pool would have been nice but I recognize it might be hard to create an elegant one that fits in
When the children were in the kids club or with a babysitter there were several relaxing pools to choose from where you were at no risk of being splashed by an errant canonbaler
